channel.title: homescreen on dill & fennel

item.title: 2019 iOS Homescreen
item.description: Another year has rushed past, and with it, another iPhone update and some changes to my phone since last year’s setup. My use of a single screen of apps continues, with a few major and minor changes alongside. I’ve posted these for the past few years, so if you want to see what apps I was using in 2017, here you go. Some things change 3 app dock—I moved my Twitter app out of my dock in order to spend less time on Twitter.
